title: Limited Stock Market Activity
description: In 2021, the total value of stocks traded in Barbados was only $220,000, indicating a relatively inactive stock market compared to global standards.

title: Minimal Social Contributions
description: Barbados recorded social contributions amounting to 239,182 local currency units in 2016, reflecting one of the lowest levels of social contributions globally.

title: Scarce Industrial Design Innovation
description: In 2017, only one industrial design application was filed by residents in Barbados, highlighting a low level of innovation in industrial design.
